sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react';
import api from './Api';
import {Card, Button,Row,Col,Container,Table,Form} from 'react-bootstrap';

function Finalizador(){

    const [state,setState] = useState('');

    return (
            <>
              <Container>

                <Row style={{ paddingTop: '5em' }}>

                         <Col md={12}>
                                <Card style={{ width: '18rem' }}>
                                    <Card.Header style={{ backgroundColor: '#5c5cff' }}>
                                        <Card.Title style={{ color: '#ffff' }}>Cadastrar Processo</Card.Title>
                                    </Card.Header>
                                    <Card.Body>
    
                                        <Row>
                                            <Col md={12}>
                                                <Form onSubmit={(e)=>this.submitProcesso(e,this.state.id)}>
                                                    <Form.Group >
                                                        <Form.Label>Descrição</Form.Label>
                                                        <Form.Control onChange={(e)=>this.setState({description:e.target.value})} value={this.state.description} type="text" id="description" name="description"/>
                                                    </Form.Group>
                                                   
                                                    <Row>
                                                        <Col style={{ paddingTop: '20px' }}>
                                                            <Button variant="primary" type="submit" name="action">Adicionar</Button>
                                                        </Col>
                                                       
                                                    </Row>
                                                </Form>
                                            </Col>
                                        </Row>
    
                                    </Card.Body>
                                </Card>
                            </Col>
                </Row>
              </Container>
            </>
    );
} 


export default Finalizador;
